dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement legal notice]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 18, 2005 12:26 PM
To: contact@catteacorner.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement legal notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement legal notice
Date: Wed, 18 May 2005 08:47:39 -0700 (PDT)
From: contact@catteacorner.com
To: info@queenofeverythingsociety.com <info@queenofeverythingsociety.com>
CC: admins@theplanet.com, info@domainsbyproxy.com, abuse@theplanet.com


To the owner of queenofeverythingsociety.com domain:

Your website contains materials copied direct from our website in flagrant
violation of our copyrights. You must remove this material immediately to
avoid legal action. You and your web hosting service are liable for any and
all copyright infringement damages relating to this violation.

The offending pages include

http://www.queenofeverythingsociety.com/TeaRooms/United%20States%20Tea%20Roo
ms.htm

http://www.queenofeverythingsociety.com/TeaRooms/alabama.htm

http://www.queenofeverythingsociety.com/TeaRooms/alaska.htm

http://www.queenofeverythingsociety.com/TeaRooms/arizona.htm

and may include others.

The text, images, and formatting of the tea room listings are obviously
copied direct from TeaGuide/The Cat-Tea Corner. The materials on these pages
are all copyright protected with copy rights assigned to us. Your pages were
clearly copied from our websites, www.teaguide.net and www.catteacorner.com.

Our websites contain clearly visible copyright notices on every page, with
some pages containing multiple notices. Therefore we must presume that you
copied this material with the intent to infringe our copyright. This is a
violation of USA and international law.

You do *not* have our permission to reprint these materials or any other
materials from our websites. We have never received a reprint request from
you; we have never granted reprint permission; we will not in future grant
such permission.

You must remove this material from your website immediately. We will check
again in three (3) business days, and if all the material you copied from us
has not been removed from your website and any and all other online or
offline entities where you may have copied it we will refer this matter to
our attorneys to file suit against you and your web hosting service for
damages and legal costs. If you copy our materials in future you will again
be liable for damages and legal costs.

By copy of this message we are notifying your web hosting service of your
liability and theirs if you do not comply with this legal demand
immediately.

JP Badarau, Editor and Publisher
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
TeaGuide The Original Online Directory of Tea Rooms www.teaguide.net USA -
Canada - England - Worldwide Since 1997 it's the best place for tea!
Hosted by The Cat-Tea Corner www.catteacorner.com

# # # #




- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

eAb1ioOCLzGDAC16D1OR9Ew=
=ajEQ
